title: Card and Board Games SFX & Music Pack
description: Roll the dice and win big with this collection of audio tracks and SFX for any card or board game. Hit the jackpot with a collection of over 500 royalty-free sound effects.
longDescription:
Roll the dice and win big with this collection of audio tracks and SFX for any card or board game. Hit the jackpot with a collection of over 500 royalty-free sound effects. From the satisfying thud of dice rolls to the dramatic shuffle of cards, every action is enriched with realistic and engaging audio. Set the perfect mood with 3 funky and jazzy music tracks, and punctuate key moments with sizzling stingers for an added layer of excitement. Play your cards right with Card and Board Games SFX & Music Pack.


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 3 x Loopable Music Track

⦿ 14 x Stingers 

⦿ 520+ Sound Effects


Card & Board Games Sound Effects and Music Pack is mostly used in; Casino games, Gambling games, Blackjack simulators, Poker simulators, Mahjong simulators, Backgammon simulators, Rummikub simulators, FRP simulators, Card Game simulators, Deck Building Games, Chess simulators, Tabletop game simulators, Tile games, Dice simulators, Mancala simulators, Card games, Playing cards simulators.

⦿ Music tracks
